Hi Dudu,

    Please copy commons-logging-api.jar into birt.war/WEB-INF/lib folder and deploy it again.
    I have deployed it sucessfully. Good luck!

I think it is due to the web server behavior. I have met the same problem before when I deployed BIRT on weblogic. But weblogic can throw the correct error message(missing common-logging class) when open URL.
